General.Name: Jeongsan Aikang Co.Ltd
General.Description: Jeongsan Aikang Co.,Ltd. produces and sells piping products in South Korea, China, the Southeast Asia, the Middle East, Japan, and the United States. The company was formerly known as Aikang Remetech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jeongsan Aikang Co.,Ltd. in April 2016. Jeongsan Aikang Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Chungju, South Korea.
